title: Update: javax.transaction.xa.* should not be migrated to jakarta.transaction.xa.*

labels.name: area/upgradetool
labels.description: issues related to upgrade tooling (openrewrite, windup, cli, etc.)

body:
### Describe the bug

It's probably incorrect to migrate `javax.transaction.xa` to `jakarta.transaction.xa`.

`javax.transaction.xa` is currently part of Java SE (see https://jakarta.ee/specifications/transactions/2.0/jakarta-transactions-spec-2.0.html#java-se)
(It can be simulated easily by upgrading on example https://github.com/apache/camel-quarkus-examples/tree/main/jta-jpa)
